knimeNode.name: Patcher
knimeNode.shortDescription: Crops segments, given by a labeling, of an image.

fullDescription.intro:
Crops segments, given by a labeling, of an image. The pixels that are not defined by the according segment a filled either with the maximum, minimum pixel value or zero.
Two cases:
No additional Image: BitMasks of the ROIs will be extracted.
Additional Image: ROI will be filled with the values of the provided image.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: Labeling representing the Region of Interests (ROIs) to be cropped.
How the image pixel will be organised in the memory. May have impact on the runtime of algorithms.

As we crop an labeling into a rectangular bounding box image, some pixels may not be covered by the ROI. Select the value of these pixels.
Minimum value of result image
Maximum value of result image
Set value to zero

tab.name: Segment Label Filter
tab.option: Only labels which hold the given rule considered during the calculation.
If true, the labels of overlapping segments will be appended in an additional column (';'-separated).

option.name: Overlapping segments do NOT need to completely overlap

tab.option: If selected, segments will also be counted as overlapping, if so don't overlap completely.
Only the labels that comply with the specified rules will appear in the list of overlapping labels.

ports.inPort: Images and corresponding Labeling in same column
